thread.title: Bernie Sanders is now a fashion icon and he's not sure what to make of it
thread.title_full: Bernie Sanders is now a fashion icon and he's not sure what to make of it

author: Rachel Thompson
title: Bernie Sanders is now a fashion icon and he's not sure what to make of it
text:
Bernie Sanders is now a fashion icon and he's not sure what to make of it 4 By Rachel Thompson 2017-02-07 12:51:27 UTC 
Bernie Sanders has taken on lots of different roles in his life so far — from filmmaker to U.S. Senator — and now he can add fashion muse to his CV. SEE ALSO: Honorary 6th grader Bernie Sanders put a Trump tweet on a giant poster and brought it to Senate 
Though Bernie didn't make a physical appearance at Paris Fashion Week in January, the runway was awash with Bernie-inspired attire. 
Balenciaga's show took heavy inspiration from Sanders' unique sense of style and featured a rebranded logo that bore a distinct similarity to his presidential campaign branding. 
Image: WWD/REX/Shutterstock 
Image: SIPA/REX/Shutterstock 
Bernie has finally spoken out about his fashion icon status. 
Asked by CNN about his newfound status as a muse, Bernie laughed off suggestions that he could ever be deemed a trendsetter. 
When asked if he ever thought he'd become a fashion icon, Bernie said: "No, not quite. I think of my many attributes, being a great dresser, or a fashion maven is not one of them." . @BernieSanders on being Balenciaga's latest muse: "Of my many attributes, being a great dresser is not one of them" https://t.co/8oCdahczU5 
Well, Bernie, there's a fashion designer out there who thinks otherwise. The internet shared Bernie's surprise at being questioned on becoming a source of fashion inspo. I just read this headline about 29573 times and it's still processing."Bernie Sanders on becoming a fashion icon" https://t.co/m8bNxpOEhj 
— Steve Kopack (@SteveKopack) February 5, 2017 Don't sell yourself short, Bernie! https://t.co/XdEMXUj25x 
— Daisy Alioto (@daisandconfused) February 5, 2017 
Embrace your new status, Bernie!
